body_html:
@drpngx @aselle I added new patch for verifying my changes using python script. You can test this python script with below commands.

$ python lstm_test.py --toco [toco location] --use_frozen_graph

When I tested this python script using original toco, it failed to find LstmCell:

tensorflow/contrib/lite/testing$ python lstm_test.py --toco [Original TOCO]/tensorflow/bazel-bin/tensorflow/contrib/lite/toco/toco --use_frozen_graph
========================
Not found 'LstmCell'
========================

But when I used this PR, the result was like below:

tensorflow/contrib/lite/testing$ python lstm_test.py --toco [applied this PR]/bazel-bin/tensorflow/contrib/lite/toco/toco --use_frozen_graph
========================
Found 'LstmCell'
========================

Also you can save the Graphviz dot or tflite file if you use --save_dot or --save_tflite.
Please take a look and leave comments.

body:
@drpngx @aselle I added new patch for verifying my changes using python script. You can test this python script with below commands.
```
$ python lstm_test.py --toco [toco location] --use_frozen_graph
```

When I tested this python script using original toco, it failed to find `LstmCell`:
```
tensorflow/contrib/lite/testing$ python lstm_test.py --toco [Original TOCO]/tensorflow/bazel-bin/tensorflow/contrib/lite/toco/toco --use_frozen_graph
========================
Not found 'LstmCell'
========================
```

But when I used this PR, the result was like below:
```
tensorflow/contrib/lite/testing$ python lstm_test.py --toco [applied this PR]/bazel-bin/tensorflow/contrib/lite/toco/toco --use_frozen_graph
========================
Found 'LstmCell'
========================
```

Also you can save the Graphviz dot or tflite file if you use `--save_dot` or `--save_tflite`.
Please take a look and leave comments.
